data.actual_result: You're scrolled back down to the previous message you were editing
data.expected_result: Your current scrolled position should be kept as you edit the new message
data.short_description: Editing messages loses current scrolled position
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a channel where you have multiple messages sent in - Send a message and then enter the edit field for it - Scroll up and attempt to edit a different message with the old one out of view
